content: weave in all the ends i also recommend blocking the gloves to fix any stretching out that may have occurred whilst you were weaving in ends or turning things inside out second glove you have two options when making the second glove 1 you can either fold the piece in half step 23 the opposite direction that you folded it for the first glove 2 or you can do steps 11 through 17 minus the join at opposite end part in place of steps 3 through 10…and then do steps 3 through 10 where you would have originally done steps 11 through 17 adding a join at the opposite end to the beginning of step 3 that has now become 11 obviously my explanation of option 2 sounds way more complicated than option 1…but if you mess around with the pattern a bit you will see what i mean o this pattern is copyright by nichole m verville as of november 2008 the pattern may be used as long as i am credited with the pattern the pattern may not be sold without permission from me the finished product from the pattern may be sold as long as i am credited for the pattern
